content: Congratulations! You have been selected for a special offer on home repairs. Click this link to claim your prize: hxxp://fakeoffer.biz
Hello! This is XYZ Home Services. How can I help you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
Hurry up, claim your $1000 gift card before it's gone! Reply WIN to get started.
It looks like you’re reaching out to XYZ Home Services. If you need help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC work, please let me know. Otherwise, I’m unable to assist with other matters.
